title: cennaki-kanda vELin
sahitya:
cennik-kanda vELin ponnaDi pOTrinAl innalaTru vAzhum inbamuTriDalAmE


anupallavi

  annai pOl anbarai anbuDan Adarittu aLLi aruLaittarum vaLLal AvAnavan


caraNam    ponnaiyum poruLaiyum kaNNena bhAvittu bhOga vAzhvil mana mOham vyApittu
eNNamellAm tanam ITTum tETTattODu Engi Engi uLLam vIngi vATTamurAdu
